nl.naturalis.oaipmh.rest

Class OAIPMHResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.naturalis.oaipmh.rest.OAIPMHResource

  • @Path(value="/")
public class OAIPMHResource
extends Object
    REST resource handling all OAI-PMH requests for all OAI repositories. Each OAI repository is accessed through a sub-resource of this REST resource. In other words, if the base URL of this REST service is http://example.com/home, then http://example.com/home/repo1 will access the repo1 repository and http://example.com/home/repo2 will access the repo2 repository.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman
